error.contact: Contact Crafty Control Support via Discord
error.embarassing: Oh my, well, this is embarrassing.
error.start-error: Server {} failed to start with error code: {}
error.closedPort: We have detected port {} may not be open on the host network or a firewall is blocking it. Remote client connections to the server may be limited.
error.internet: We have detected the machine running Crafty has no connection to the internet. Client connections to the server may be limited.

404.contact: Contact Crafty Control Support via Discord
404.unableToFind: We were unable to find the page you are looking for. Please try again, or go back and refresh.

serverWizard.quickSettingsDescription: Don't worry, you can change these later
serverWizard.bePatient: Please be patient as we ' + (importing ? 'import' :  'download') + ' the server

dashboard.bePatientStart:
Please be patient while we start the server.
This screen will refresh in a moment
dashboard.bePatientStop:
Please be patient while we stop the server.
This screen will refresh in a moment
dashboard.bePatientRestart:
Please be patient while we restart the server.
This screen will refresh in a moment
dashboard.bePatientClone:
Please be patient while we clone the server.
This screen will refresh in a moment
dashboard.delay-explained: The service/agent has recently started and is delaying the start of the minecraft server instance

accessDenied.noAccess: You do not have access to this resource
accessDenied.contactAdmin: Contact your server administrator for access to this resource, or if you think you should have access to this resource, contact support.
accessDenied.contact: Contact Crafty Control Support via Discord

serverTerm.delay-explained: The service/agent has recently started and is delaying the start of the minecraft server instance

serverBackups.storageLocationDesc: Where do you want to store backups?
serverBackups.maxBackupsDesc: Crafty will not store more than N backups, deleting the oldest (enter 0 to keep all)
serverBackups.backupTask: A backup task has been started.
serverBackups.confirmDelete: Do you want to delete this backup? This cannot be undone.

serverFiles.noscript: The file manager does not work without JavaScript
serverFiles.createFileQuestion: What name do you want for the new file?
serverFiles.createDirQuestion: What name do you want for the new directory?
serverFiles.renameItemQuestion: What should the new name be?
serverFiles.deleteItemQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete " + name + "?
serverFiles.deleteItemQuestionMessage:
You are deleting \"" + path + "\"!

This action will be irreversible and it'll be lost forever!
serverFiles.unsupportedLanguage: Warning: This is not a supported file type
serverFiles.clickUpload: Click here to select your files
serverFiles.waitUpload: Please wait while we upload your files... This may take a while.

serverConfig.serverNameDesc: What you wish to call this server
serverConfig.serverLogLocationDesc: Absolute full path to the log file
serverConfig.serverExecutionCommandDesc: What will be launched in a hidden terminal
serverConfig.serverStopCommandDesc: Command to send the program to stop it
serverConfig.serverAutostartDelayDesc: Delay before auto starting (If enabled below)
serverConfig.serverIPDesc: IP Crafty should connect to for stats (Try a real ip instead of 127.0.0.1 if you have issues)
serverConfig.serverPortDesc: Port Crafty should connect to for stats
serverConfig.removeOldLogsAfterDesc: How many days will a log file has to be old to get deleted (0 is off)
serverConfig.stopBeforeDeleting: Please stop the server before deleting it
serverConfig.bePatientUpdate:
Please be patient while we update the server. Download times can vary depending upon your internet speeds.
This screen will refresh in a moment
serverConfig.deleteServerQuestionMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this server? After this there is no going back...
serverConfig.deleteFilesQuestionMessage: Would you like Crafty to delete all server files from the host machine?
serverConfig.bePatientDelete: Please be patient while we remove your server from the Crafty panel. This screen will close in a few moments.
serverConfig.bePatientDeleteFiles: Please be patient while we remove your server from the Crafty panel and delete all files. This screen will close in a few moments.

serverConfigHelp.title: Server Config Area
serverConfigHelp.desc: Here is where you can change the configuration of your server
perms: It is recommended to NOT change the paths of a server managed by Crafty.
Changing paths CAN break things, especially on Linux type operating systems where file permissions are more locked down.
If you feel you have to change a where a server is located you may do so as long as you give the "crafty" user permission to read / write to the server path.
On Linux this is best done by executing the following:

buttons.copyKeys:
Press ctrl or u2318 + C to copy the table data to your system clipboard.

To cancel, click this message or press escape.

rows.0: Click on a row to select it

cells.0: Click on a cel to select it

columns.0: Click on a column to select it

base.doesNotWorkWithoutJavascript: Warning: Crafty doesn't work properly when JavaScript isn't enabled!
